enWisdom: Piety is the lamp of success
Be God-wary and you will succeed [in this world and the next]
Guard yourself against sins and restrain yourselves from them, for indeed, wretched is the one who gives them free rein
The chiefs of the people of Paradise are the God-fearing and the virtuous

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِلُزُومِ الْيَقِينِ وَالتَّقْوَى فَإِنَّهُمَا يُبَلِّغَانِكُمْ جَنَّةَ الْمَأْوَى
enWisdom: Cling to certitude and God-wariness, for indeed these two will deliver you to the Garden of [everlasting] Refuge
Whoever fears Allah gains success and becomes prosperous

Wisdom: مَنْ أَشْعَرَ قَلْبَهُ التَّقْوَى فَازَ عَمَلُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever fills his heart with God-wariness, his endeavour becomes successful

Wisdom: مَنْ أَحَبَّ فَوْزَ الْآخِرَةِ فَعَلَيْهِ بِالتَّقْوَى
enWisdom: Whoever would like success in the Hereafter should espouse God-wariness

Wisdom: وَسِيقَ الَّذِينَ اتَّقَوْا رَبَّهُمْ إِلَى الْجَنَّةِ زُمَراً قَدْ أُمِنَ الْعِقَابُ وَانْقَطَعَ الْعِتَابُ وَزُحْزِحُوا عَنِ النَّارِ وَاطْمَأَنَّتْ بِهِمُ الدَّارَ وَرَضُوا الْمَثْوَى وَالْقَرَارَ
enWisdom: Those who are wary of [their duty towards] their Lord are driven to Paradise in throngs, having being saved from the chastisement, cut off from the punishment and delivered from the fire [of Hell] into the Abode of tranquillity, and they will pleased with their dwelling and residence

Wisdom: مَا أَنْفَعَ الْمَوْتَ لِمَنْ أَشْعَرَ الْإِيمَانَ وَالتَّقْوَى قَلْبَهُ
enWisdom: How beneficial death is for the one who has filled his heart with faith and God-wariness!
The kings of Paradise are the God-wary and the sincere

Wisdom: نَالَ الْجَنَّةَ مَنِ اتَّقَى عَنِ الْمَحَارِمِ
enWisdom: One who shuns what is forbidden shall attain Paradise

Wisdom: لَا يَهْلِكُ عَلَى التَّقْوَى سِنْخُ أَصْلٍ وَلَا يَظْمَأُ عَلَيْهَا زَرْعٌ
enWisdom: The thing that is rooted in God-wariness is never destroyed and the plant that grows on it never remains thirsty
